020
021import net.tnemc.item.AbstractItemStack;
022import net.tnemc.item.bukkit.BukkitItemStack;
023import net.tnemc.item.bukkit.platform.BukkitItemPlatform;
024import net.tnemc.item.component.impl.BundleComponent;
025import net.tnemc.item.providers.VersionUtil;
026import org.bukkit.Material;
027import org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack;
028import org.bukkit.inventory.meta.BundleMeta;
029
030import java.util.Map;
031import java.util.Optional;
032
033/**
034 * BukkitBundleComponent
035 *
036 * @author creatorfromhell
037 * @since 0.2.0.0
038 */
039public class BukkitBundleComponent extends BundleComponent<BukkitItemStack, ItemStack> {
040
041  public BukkitBundleComponent() {
042
043  }
044
045  public BukkitBundleComponent(final Map<Integer, AbstractItemStack<ItemStack>> items) {
046
047    super(items);
048  }
049
050  /**
051   * @param version the version being used when this check is called.
052   *
053   * @return true if this check is enabled for the version, otherwise false
054   */
055  @Override
056  public boolean enabled(final String version) {
057
058    return VersionUtil.isOneSeventeen(version);
059  }
060
061  /**
062   * @param serialized the serialized item stack to use
063   * @param item       the item that we should use to apply this applicator to.
064   *
065   * @return the updated item.
066   */
067  @Override
068  public ItemStack apply(final BukkitItemStack serialized, final ItemStack item) {
069
070    final Optional<BukkitBundleComponent> componentOptional = serialized.component(identifier());
071    componentOptional.ifPresent(component->{
072
073      if(item.hasItemMeta() && item.getItemMeta() instanceof final BundleMeta meta) {
074
075        componentOptional.get().items.forEach((slot, stack)->meta.addItem(stack.provider().locale(serialized)));
076
077        item.setItemMeta(meta);
078      }
079    });
080    return item;
081  }
082
083  /**
084   * @param item       the item that we should use to deserialize.
085   * @param serialized the serialized item stack we should use to apply this deserializer to
086   *
087   * @return the updated serialized item.
088   */
089  @Override
090  public BukkitItemStack serialize(final ItemStack item, final BukkitItemStack serialized) {
091
092    if(item.hasItemMeta() && item.getItemMeta() instanceof final BundleMeta meta) {
093
094      int i = 0;
095      for(final ItemStack stack : meta.getItems()) {
096
097        if(stack == null) {
098          continue;
099        }
100
101        if(stack.getType().equals(Material.AIR)) {
102          continue;
103        }
104
105        final BukkitItemStack containerSerial = new BukkitItemStack().of(stack);
106        BukkitItemPlatform.PLATFORM.providerApplies(containerSerial, stack);
107        items.put(i, containerSerial);
108        i++;
109      }
110    }
111
112    serialized.applyComponent(this);
113    return serialized;
114  }
115
116  /**
117   * Checks if this component applies to the specified item.
118   *
119   * @param item The item to check against.
120   *
121   * @return True if this component applies to the item, false otherwise.
122   */
123  @Override
124  public boolean appliesTo(final ItemStack item) {
125
126    return item.hasItemMeta() && item.getItemMeta() instanceof BundleMeta;
127  }
128}
